name: Game Operator
description:
Play the classic Korean Games but with a twist, YOU are the Game Operator. You are the one making these childhood games become deadly games. They are fighting for survival, you are fighting to protect what is yours.
Red Light Green Light - be ready to shoot them, you have 45.6B to protect! The arena is yours, you are the boss!
Broken Candy - well...you know what to do…
Child’s Game - is it though?
